H0.text: Decreases is the atmospheric pressure as altitude increases.

H1.text: Increase is the change in atmospheric pressure that occurs as altitude increases.

H2.text: Stays the same is the correct description of atmospheric pressure when altitude increases.

H3.text: Depends on other factors is the answer to whether atmospheric pressure increases or decreases as altitude increases.

A4.text: As altitude increases, atmospheric pressure decreases.

A5.text: Atmospheric pressure varies with the altitude of the surface, so air pressure on mountains is usually lower than air pressure at sea level.
